author: Special Correspondent
text:
Employees of Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL), affiliated to the National Federation of Telecom Employees, National Union of BSNL Workers and SC/ST Employees’ Welfare Association, staged a demonstration here on Thursday in support of their 11-point charter of demands.

The demands of the employees included allocation of additional staff to repair cable fault and undertake other outdoor work. They alleged that the failure to look into complaints of cable fault in Tirumangalam exchange had resulted in the migration of several subscribers to other telecom providers. The employees wanted the “unwanted” cable laying work stopped in Tirumangalam and Sholavandan areas and closure of the “unauthorised” stock yard at Tirumangalam.

Those who addressed the demonstration included G. Rajendran of NFTE, S. Muthukumar of FNTO and S. Kandasamy of SEWA.
title: Telecom staff stage demonstration
